com.pvptowerdefense.database.cards

Class CardsController

 @RequestMapping(value="/cards")
public class CardsController
extends Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardsController

        @Autowired
public CardsController(CardsService autowiredCardsService)
        Controller class for the cards service. Used to access the cards database table.
        Parameters:
        autowiredCardsService - Autowired instance of CardService

    • Method Detail

      • addCardToDB

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="")
public void addCardToDB(@RequestBody
                                                                               Card card)
        Adds a card to the database by sending a post request to the /cards url with the card in the request body.

        Example of format

        {
        "name": "Card 1",
        "description": "Card 1 desc",
        "cost": 1,
        "damage": 1,
        "hitPoints": 1,
        "speed": 1,
        "type": "melee"
        }

        Parameters:
        card - The card information in JSON format

      • getAllCards

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="")
public List<Card> getAllCards()
        Used to get all the card types from the database. This database will be static, meaning cards cannot be added, removed, or changed unless done so for game balancing.
        Returns:
        List of the cards

      • loadCardsToDatabase

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/load")
public void loadCardsToDatabase()
        Loads a list of temporary cards into the cards database.

      • getCardByName

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/{cardName}")
public Card getCardByName(@PathVariable
                                                                                           String cardName)
        Returns the card with the given name.
        Parameters:
        cardName - The name of the card you are looking for
        Returns:
        List of the cards
